$eref.description: Describes the properties of a Virtual Machine Extension.

___type.description: Gets or sets the type of the extension handler.

___settings.description: Gets or sets Json formatted public settings for the extension.

___typeHandlerVersion.description: Gets or sets the type version of the extension handler.

___protectedSettings.description: Gets or sets Json formatted protected settings for the extension.

___forceUpdateTag.description: Gets or sets how the extension handler should be forced to update even if the extension configuration has not changed.

___instanceView.description: Gets or sets the virtual machine extension instance view.

___publisher.description: Gets or sets the name of the extension handler publisher.

___provisioningState.description: Gets or sets the provisioning state, which only appears in the response.

___autoUpgradeMinorVersion.description: Gets or sets whether the extension handler should be automatically upgraded across minor versions.

$eref.description: Describes the properties of a Virtual Machine Scale Set.

___overProvision.description: Specifies whether the Virtual Machine Scale Set should be overprovisioned.

___virtualMachineProfile.description: Gets or sets the virtual machine profile.

___upgradePolicy.description: Gets or sets the upgrade policy.

___provisioningState.description: Gets or sets the provisioning state, which only appears in the response.

$eref.description: Describes a virtual machine scale set sku.

___name.description: Gets or sets the sku name.

___capacity.description: Gets or sets the sku capacity.

___tier.description: Gets or sets the sku tier.

___sku.description: Gets or sets the virtual machine scale set sku.

$eref.description: The instance view of a resource.

___statuses.description: Gets or sets the resource status information.

___virtualMachines.description: Gets or sets a list containing reference to all Virtual Machines  created under this Availability Set.

___platformUpdateDomainCount.description: Gets or sets Update Domain count.

___platformFaultDomainCount.description: Gets or sets Fault Domain count.

$eref.description: Plan for the resource.

___name.description: Gets or sets the plan ID.

___promotionCode.description: Gets or sets the promotion code.

___product.description: Gets or sets the offer ID.

___publisher.description: Gets or sets the publisher ID.

___plan.description: Gets or sets the purchase plan when deploying virtual machine from VM Marketplace images.

$eref.description: Describes the properties of a Virtual Machine.

___osProfile.description: Gets or sets the OS profile.

___hardwareProfile.description: Gets or sets the hardware profile.

___networkProfile.description: Gets or sets the network profile.

___licenseType.description: Gets or sets the license type, which is for bring your own license scenario.

___diagnosticsProfile.description: Gets or sets the diagnostics profile.

___availabilitySet.description: Gets or sets the reference Id of the availability set to which this virtual machine belongs.

___storageProfile.description: Gets or sets the storage profile.

___provisioningState.description: Gets or sets the provisioning state, which only appears in the response.

$eref.description: Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/extensions

_88VirtualMachineScaleSetNetworkProfile.description: Describes a virtual machine scale set network profile.

$eref.description: Describes a virtual machine scale set network profile's network configurations.

___name.description: Gets or sets the network configuration name.

___networkInterfaceConfigurations.description: Gets or sets the list of network configurations.

___id.description: Gets or sets ARM resource id in the form of /subscriptions/{SubcriptionId}/resourceGroups/{ResourceGroupName}/...

_88VirtualMachineScaleSetStorageProfile.description: Describes a virtual machine scale set storage profile.

$eref.description: Describes a virtual machine scale set operating system disk.

___name.description: Gets or sets the disk name.

___osType.description: Gets or sets the Operating System type.

___caching.description: Gets or sets the caching type.

___createOption.description: Gets or sets the create option.

___image.description: Gets or sets the Source User Image VirtualHardDisk. This VirtualHardDisk will be copied before using it to attach to the Virtual Machine.If SourceImage is provided, the destination VirtualHardDisk should not exist.

___vhdContainers.description: Gets or sets the list of virtual hard disk container uris.

___osDisk.description: Gets or sets the OS disk.

$eref.description: The image reference.

___version.description: Gets or sets the image version. The allowed formats are Major.Minor.Build or 'latest'. Major, Minor and Build being decimal numbers. Specify 'latest' to use the latest version of image.

___offer.description: Gets or sets the image offer.

___sku.description: Gets or sets the image sku.

___publisher.description: Gets or sets the image publisher.

___imageReference.description: Gets or sets the image reference.

___name.description: Gets or sets the disk name.

$eref.description: Describes a Encryption Settings for a Disk

___diskEncryptionKey.description: Gets or sets the disk encryption key which is a KeyVault Secret.

___keyEncryptionKey.description: Gets or sets the key encryption key which is KeyVault Key.

___enabled.description: Gets or sets whether disk encryption should be enabled on the Virtual Machine.

___encryptionSettings.description: Gets or sets the disk encryption settings.

___osType.description: Gets or sets the Operating System type.

$eref.description: Describes the uri of a disk.

___uri.description: Gets or sets the virtual hard disk's uri. It should be a valid Uri to a virtual hard disk.

___vhd.description: Gets or sets the Virtual Hard Disk.

___caching.description: Gets or sets the caching type.

___diskSizeGB.description: Gets or sets the initial disk size in GB for blank data disks, and the new desired size for existing OS and Data disks.

___createOption.description: Gets or sets the create option.

$eref.description: Describes the uri of a disk.

___uri.description: Gets or sets the virtual hard disk's uri. It should be a valid Uri to a virtual hard disk.

___image.description: Gets or sets the Source User Image VirtualHardDisk. This VirtualHardDisk will be copied before using it to attach to the Virtual Machine.If SourceImage is provided, the destination VirtualHardDisk should not exist.

_88DiskEncryptionSettings.description: Describes a Encryption Settings for a Disk

$eref.description: Describes a reference to Key Vault Secret

___secretUrl.description: Gets or sets the URL referencing a secret in a Key Vault.

___sourceVault.description: Gets or sets the Relative URL of the Key Vault containing the secret.

___diskEncryptionKey.description: Gets or sets the disk encryption key which is a KeyVault Secret.

$eref.description: Describes a reference to Key Vault Key

___keyUrl.description: Gets or sets the URL referencing a key in a Key Vault.

___sourceVault.description: Gets or sets the Relative URL of the Key Vault containing the key

___keyEncryptionKey.description: Gets or sets the key encryption key which is KeyVault Key.

___enabled.description: Gets or sets whether disk encryption should be enabled on the Virtual Machine.

_88VaultSecretGroup.description: Describes a set of certificates which are all in the same Key Vault.

$eref.description: Describes a single certificate reference in a Key Vault, and where the certificate should reside on the VM.

___certificateStore.description: Gets or sets the Certificate store in LocalMachine to add the certificate to on Windows, leave empty on Linux.

___certificateUrl.description: Gets or sets the URL referencing a secret in a Key Vault which contains a properly formatted certificate.

___vaultCertificates.description: Gets or sets the list of key vault references in SourceVault which contain certificates

___sourceVault.description: Gets or sets the Relative URL of the Key Vault containing all of the certificates in VaultCertificates.

_88LinuxConfiguration.description: Describes Windows Configuration of the OS Profile.

___disablePasswordAuthentication.description: Gets or sets whether Authentication using user name and password is allowed or not

$eref.description: SSH configuration for Linux based VMs running on Azure

___publicKeys.description: Gets or sets the list of SSH public keys used to authenticate with linux based VMs

___ssh.description: Gets or sets the SSH configuration for linux VMs

_88AdditionalUnattendContent.description: Gets or sets additional XML formatted information that can be included in the Unattend.xml file, which is used by Windows Setup. Contents are defined by setting name, component name, and the pass in which the content is a applied.

___passName.description: Gets or sets the pass name. Currently, the only allowable value is oobeSystem.

___settingName.description: Gets or sets setting name (e.g. FirstLogonCommands, AutoLogon ).

___componentName.description: Gets or sets the component name. Currently, the only allowable value is Microsoft-Windows-Shell-Setup.

___content.description: Gets or sets XML formatted content that is added to the unattend.xml file in the specified pass and component.The XML must be less than 4 KB and must include the root element for the setting or feature that is being inserted.

_88AvailabilitySetProperties.description: The instance view of a resource.

$eref.description: Instance view status.

___time.description: Gets or sets the time of the status.

___message.description: Gets or sets the detailed Message, including for alerts and error messages.

___level.description: Gets or sets the level Code.

___displayStatus.description: Gets or sets the short localizable label for the status.

___statuses.description: Gets or sets the resource status information.

___virtualMachines.description: Gets or sets a list containing reference to all Virtual Machines  created under this Availability Set.

___platformUpdateDomainCount.description: Gets or sets Update Domain count.

___platformFaultDomainCount.description: Gets or sets Fault Domain count.

_88WinRMListener.description: Describes Protocol and thumbprint of Windows Remote Management listener

___protocol.description: Gets or sets the Protocol used by WinRM listener. Currently only Http and Https are supported.

___certificateUrl.description: Gets or sets the Certificate URL in KMS for Https listeners. Should be null for Http listeners.

$eref.description: Describes Windows Configuration of the OS Profile.

___disablePasswordAuthentication.description: Gets or sets whether Authentication using user name and password is allowed or not

___ssh.description: Gets or sets the SSH configuration for linux VMs

___linuxConfiguration.description: Gets or sets the Linux Configuration of the OS profile.

___vaultCertificates.description: Gets or sets the list of key vault references in SourceVault which contain certificates

___sourceVault.description: Gets or sets the Relative URL of the Key Vault containing all of the certificates in VaultCertificates.

___secrets.description: Gets or sets the List of certificates for addition to the VM.

___customData.description: Gets or sets a base-64 encoded string of custom data.

_88SshConfiguration.description: SSH configuration for Linux based VMs running on Azure

$eref.description: Contains information about SSH certificate public key and the path on the Linux VM where the public key is placed.

___keyData.description: Gets or sets Certificate public key used to authenticate with VM through SSH.The certificate must be in Pem format with or without headers.

___path.description: Gets or sets the full path on the created VM where SSH public key is stored. If the file already exists, the specified key is appended to the file.

___publicKeys.description: Gets or sets the list of SSH public keys used to authenticate with linux based VMs

_88VaultCertificate.description: Describes a single certificate reference in a Key Vault, and where the certificate should reside on the VM.

___certificateStore.description: Gets or sets the Certificate store in LocalMachine to add the certificate to on Windows, leave empty on Linux.

___certificateUrl.description: Gets or sets the URL referencing a secret in a Key Vault which contains a properly formatted certificate.

___networkInterfaces.description: Gets or sets the network interfaces.

___offer.description: Gets or sets the image offer.

___sku.description: Gets or sets the image sku.

___publisher.description: Gets or sets the image publisher.

___imageReference.description: Gets or sets the image reference.

$eref.description: Describes a data disk.

___name.description: Gets or sets the disk name.

___lun.description: Gets or sets the logical unit number.

___vhd.description: Gets or sets the Virtual Hard Disk.

___caching.description: Gets or sets the caching type.

___diskSizeGB.description: Gets or sets the initial disk size in GB for blank data disks, and the new desired size for existing OS and Data disks.

___createOption.description: Gets or sets the create option.

___image.description: Gets or sets the Source User Image VirtualHardDisk. This VirtualHardDisk will be copied before using it to attach to the Virtual Machine.If SourceImage is provided, the destination VirtualHardDisk should not exist.

___dataDisks.description: Gets or sets the data disks.

_88VirtualMachineScaleSetOSDisk.description: Describes a virtual machine scale set operating system disk.

___name.description: Gets or sets the disk name.

___osType.description: Gets or sets the Operating System type.

___caching.description: Gets or sets the caching type.

___createOption.description: Gets or sets the create option.

$eref.description: Describes the uri of a disk.

___uri.description: Gets or sets the virtual hard disk's uri. It should be a valid Uri to a virtual hard disk.

___image.description: Gets or sets the Source User Image VirtualHardDisk. This VirtualHardDisk will be copied before using it to attach to the Virtual Machine.If SourceImage is provided, the destination VirtualHardDisk should not exist.

___vhdContainers.description: Gets or sets the list of virtual hard disk container uris.

___storageUri.description: Gets or sets the boot diagnostics storage Uri. It should be a valid Uri

___enabled.description: Gets or sets whether boot diagnostics should be enabled on the Virtual Machine.
